name: Deep Core Crisis
description:
Descend to earth's core and collect orbs to save the world.

Earth's Core has just awakened and you need to prevent the end of the world before time runs out. Descend the 10 levels dungeon, collect orbs and reach Earth's Core in time but be careful: you must have 100 orbs at the end for you to stop the destruction. 

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deep-core-crisis
